title: Web error details

xdm:errorMessage.title: Error Message
xdm:errorMessage.description: Tracks the error message presented to the visitor.

xdm:errorType.title: Error Type
xdm:errorType.description: Tracks the error type presented to the visitor, if applicable.

xdm:errorCode.title: Error Code
xdm:errorCode.description: Tracks the error code presented to the visitor, if applicable.

xdm:errorEvent.title: Error Event
xdm:errorEvent.description: Tracks when the error event occurs.
